snippet.title: SNES Longplay [369] Demon's Crest
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

Demon's Crest (in Japanese is Demon's Blazon Makaimura Monsho hen) is a game of Super Nintendo, released in 1994, developed and produced by Capcom. The game is a platform genre, but has strong RPG elements. Demon's Crest is part of the series: Gargoyle's Quest and Ghosts'n Goblins.

The game tells the story of a civil war in the kingdom of demons, this war was caused by the mysterious appearance of crests in the realm of demons, if the crests are gathered the bearer of them earn unlimited powers. Then the demon Firebrand (Red Arremer in Japan) known character of the series Gargoyle's Quest (a spin-off of another famous series: Ghosts' n Goblins), win the civil war and conquer five of the six crests. The last was with a dragon, Firebrand can beat him up, but leaves the fight badly injured and ends up being stolen by another demon called Phalanx, leaving Firebrand only with one piece of Fire Crest. This is where the game starts you in control of Firebrand hunting the other amulets and other parts of the crest of fire.
The game have many influences of Mega Man and Castlevania in your gameplay and soundtrack. Each crest gives different powers to our demon Firebrand. This run is 100%, includes all items, the best ending and the cruel struggle with Dark Demon. -
